ack.p: We are grateful to David Sánchez de Ron, Iciar Alberdi and Javier Pórtoles for their collaboration during previous research stages, and to the staff of SEO/BirdLife for their work in the management of the bird atlas data. We acknowledge the Spanish Meteorological Agency (AEMET) and the Climate Research Foundation (FIC) for producing and making available the bioclimatic data. We also thank the “Scientific research for the adaptation of Pinus pinaster Ait. and Pinus halepensis Mill. to climate change” project, funded by the Spanish Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Environment. This study is framed within the project INIA ref. RTA2013-00048-C03-01 funded by the Spanish Ministry of Economy and Competitiveness, and is a contribution to the thematic network REMEDINAL3-CM (S2013/MAE-2719).
